text: has anyone noticed this, that when a child theme is in play that for membership templates, and email subscription templates you don’t have the option to select the child theme, it shows 2 of the parent? You can with following system pages 404, 500, Password and Search. Support told me this is the intended feature which seems not correct. They said you need to clone the template into your child theme, but then how are customers who install your theme who may not be developers get updates to those templates. here are screenshot showing what we are seeing in a client’s portal.

Email templates will show the path for the marketplace/parent for every child, but if you use the search at the top to type in the unique part of your child theme name, you can isolate it in the dropdown without cloning the files to the child theme
